short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keeps you from being logged out of UBC Scope

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keeps you from being logged out of UBC Scope. Blocks the popup that appears every 30 minutes. Sends the keep alive request every 15 minutes.

Should work as long you don't disconnect from the site for more than 15-30 minutes.
